医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Cellectricon 在疼痛研究方面的专业知识获得第二项欧盟研究拨款认可BonePainIII 项目将支持早期研究人员寻求新的机制见解和潜在的治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Cellectricone28099s-expertise-in-pain-research-recognized-by-second-EU-research-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Cellectricone28099s-expertise-in-pain-research-recognized-by-second-EU-research-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b497de19-5f5b-4116-ab37-e27277142678 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 08:43:00 -0500 Cellectricon’s expertise in pain research recognized by second EU research grant
祖父母的支持可以改善单亲母亲的心理健康吗？祖父母的支持在保护母亲免受抑郁症中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Can-grandparental-support-improve-the-mental-health-of-single-mothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Can-grandparental-support-improve-the-mental-health-of-single-mothers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=748228fe-5096-46d8-90cc-27b95cef19c7 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 08:29:00 -0500 Can grandparental support improve the mental health of single mothers?
研究提供证据表明怀孕期间使用抗抑郁药会影响孩子的大脑发育一项新研究探讨了暴露于 5-HT 时小鼠 PFC 中突触的成熟情况，揭示了化学物质与未来行为变化之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Study-provides-evidence-that-antidepressant-use-in-pregnancy-affects-childs-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Study-provides-evidence-that-antidepressant-use-in-pregnancy-affects-childs-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01120625-ccae-4142-be65-9fe6e6f025e1 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 08:18:00 -0500 Study provides evidence that antidepressant use in pregnancy affects child's brain development

新型单克隆抗体有望靶向 HER2 阳性乳腺癌细胞在乳腺癌治疗方面向前迈出了一步，东北大学的研究人员开发出了一种新型单克隆抗体，专门针对某种类型的乳腺癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Novel-monoclonal-antibody-shows-promise-in-Targeting-HER2-positive-breast-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Novel-monoclonal-antibody-shows-promise-in-Targeting-HER2-positive-breast-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95f7fc8c-8a2b-4d30-a4c4-8b5b781541d2 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 07:12:00 -0500 Novel monoclonal antibody shows promise in targeting HER2-positive breast cancer cells
褪黑激素治疗不影响夜班工人的胰岛素抵抗萨里大学和汉堡大学医学中心的一项新研究表明，褪黑素治疗不会影响夜班工人的胰岛素抵抗或葡萄糖耐量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Melatonin-treatment-does-not-affect-insulin-resistance-of-night-shift-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Melatonin-treatment-does-not-affect-insulin-resistance-of-night-shift-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03970696-782f-4dcf-a032-1718b1f0ef9c Mon, 19 Feb 2024 07:07:05 -0500 Melatonin treatment does not affect insulin resistance of night shift workers
关系因素、经济困难和社会人口因素与心理健康之间有何关联？婚姻/关系观念、经济困难和社会人口因素对心理健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/What-is-the-association- Between-relationship-factors-financial-difficulties-and-socio-demographic-factors-with-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/What-is-the-association- Between-relationship-factors-financial-difficulties-and-socio-demographic-factors-with-mental-health.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=701fa956-456c-4340-b466-21187bafc506 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 06:42:00 -0500 What is the association between relationship factors, financial difficulties, and socio-demographic factors with mental health?
单剂量基因药物可阻止小鼠 ALS 和额颞叶痴呆的进展澳大利亚麦考瑞大学的神经科学家开发出一种单剂量基因药物，已被证明可以阻止小鼠 ALS 和额颞叶痴呆 (FTD) 的进展，甚至有可能逆转这些致命疾病的一些影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Single-dose-genic-medicine-halts-the-progression-of-ALS-and-frontotemporal-dementia-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Single-dose-genic-medicine-halts-the-progression-of-ALS-and-frontotemporal-dementia-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83851d25-1be3-4c1a-9194-4e84651ca8da Mon, 19 Feb 2024 06:40:07 -0500 Single-dose genetic medicine halts the progression of ALS and frontotemporal dementia in mice
研究发现，不断上涨的药物成本对糖尿病治疗构成障碍积极管理糖尿病对于预防长期健康并发症至关重要，但不断上涨的费用给治疗带来了障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Rising-medication-costs-pose-barrier-to-diabetes-treatment-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Rising-medication-costs-pose-barrier-to-diabetes-treatment-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d8b300e-2cfe-44ad-96f2-0c1c97b1ec79 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 06:32:31 -0500 Rising medication costs pose barrier to diabetes treatment, study finds
